channel.title: Architectures on Symphony Integrations official documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Architectures on Symphony Integrations official documentation

item.title: Architecture
item.description: This page guides developers to create their first Symphony Integration, also known as Symphony Integration Bridge. Integration Bridge architecture The Integration Bridge is responsible for managing active integrations and provides key services to allow third party services the ability to post messages into a configurable set of streams The key services provided to the registered integrations are: Authentication proxy - each integration should be configured with credentials, but the implementation never needs to deal with them.
